amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that existing clean water protections apply to the release of these toxic chemicals into the environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-145 to ensure that existing clean water protections apply to the release of these toxic chemicals into the environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 229 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 229 (Roll no. 279).
